caption.p:
Superimposition of CAA â€“ hCA II complexes as determined by X-ray crystallography. (A) Surface view: the hydrophobic half of the active site is coloured red; His
64 is coloured green and the hydrophilic half in blue. (B) Ribbon active site view. The activators are histamine, in green (PDB 1AVN); L-His, in magenta (PDB 2ABE); L-Phe, in gold (PDB 2FMG); adrenaline, in cyan (PDB 2HKK).
